question: Books on Quran and Hadiths?
answer:
QUESTION
I want to know some good and authentic books in English and Urdu on the following topics and subjects :- 1. Quran - Translation and Tafseer 2. Sihah Bukhari complete 3. Sahih Muslim complete 4. Seerat-un-Nabvi 5. Any good book on Prophet (PBUH) companions If possible please mention the author and publisher names as well. Here in USA, dar-us-salam publication (http://www.dar-us-salam.com) is offering some very nice books on the topics. But they have more than one book on the same topic, whereas I want to pick the best of them or from any others available. JazakAllah Khair
ANSWER
